author.bio: Dr. Chiang is a relief veterinarian, web developer, and entrepreneur who believes that the mental wellbeing crisis within the veterinary industry can be drastically improved through exploration and collaboration. In his free time, he is a fitness enthusiast who also enjoys traveling and trying out new food. Oh, he is also a corgi fanatic!
author.name: Andy Chiang, DVM

node.title: DVM Balloons Ep. 2 – New Year Champagne Cupcakes with Dr. Geena Ng
node.excerpt: Dr. Ng celebrates the New Year in style by baking her signature champagne cupcake! In this episode, she talks about how baking helps her through the ups and downs of being a veterinarian.

node.title: DVM Balloons Ep. 1 – Run with Dr. Kimberly Pope-Robinson
node.excerpt: Dr. Kimberly Pope-Robinson, founder of 1 Life Connected and author of The Unspoken Life, drops by to share the meanings behind “”balloons” and “sinkers.” One of her favorite balloons is running. She put her balloon filling in action by taking me on a run!
